description: With his roommate not due home for a few hours, Lance Ford decides to set up an afternoon hookup with David Skylar from the gym. He caught David peeking while he was doing squats, and their chemistry was instant. He takes Lance up on his invite and the two of them waste no time getting down to business, but they're both about to get twice what they bargained for when roomie Dante Colle comes home early. After spying through the door long enough to get rock hard, he decides to join them in this after workout 'workout'. David may have just set his personal record in the bench press, but he's about to set a new benchmark in his private life, as Dante and Lance team up to give him the house special.Enjoy!
series: NDB - 5041 - David Skylar, Dante Colle & Lance Ford
title: Gym Slut
